headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Hager Coviva devices
footerDisplay: If you have any suggestions, please open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/tylerrmit/homebridge-coviva-hager/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: You shouldn't need to change this.

covivaId.title: Coviva ID
covivaId.description: The Coviva ID that you specified to login to your phone app

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval
pollingInterval.description: Instruct the plugin to poll the Coviva API every N seconds for the latest device statuses.  If you set this to zero, there will be no polling, and the plugin will rely on the Coviva API to proactively push out the latest statuses.  Must be set to either >= 60 (to avoid potentially upsetting Hager) or zero.  Default 180.

pingInterval.title: Ping Interval
pingInterval.description: Instruct the plugin to sent a simple
message to Coviva every N seconds, to keep the connection alive.  Must be 5 or larger. Default 60.
